skills.name: Chase (チェイス）
skills.text:
1. [On Main Battery Salvo], prioritizes target with the lowest current HP.
2. If a ship sinks during salvo, 100% chance to reload own [Main Battery].
3. If Dorsetshire is in the same battle, increases all of Norfolk's damage by 12%.

skills.name: Salvo Warning (着弾警戒·剛)
skills.text:
1. Increases Armour by 20%.
2. Increases Crit Rate of Allied Fleet [Main Battery Salvo] if Norfolk participates in it by 10%.
